page.description: Gets information about the server side query
page.discussion: Gets information about the server side query of an active-link table

item.name: IsActiveLinkTable
item.description: Returns .t. or .f. depending on whether the table is an active-link table or not.

item.name: BaseFilter
item.description: Returns the WHERE clause for the SQL SELECT statement used in the active-link table definition.

item.name: IncrementalFilter
item.description: Returns any incremental server-side filters that were applied after the table was opened.

item.name: CompleteFilter
item.description: The complete WHERE clause of the current SQL SELECT statement for the active-link table (base filter and incremental filter).

item.name: CurrentOrder
item.description: The ORDER BY clause of the current SQL SELECT statement for the active-link table.

item.name: DBFColumnOrder
item.description: If the current server-side sort order maps to a single field in the active-link table, then this contains the name of the field in the active-link table

item.name: HasError Returns
item.description: .t. if the SQL statement for the active-link table could not be parsed.

item.name: ErrorText
item.description: If HasError is .t., the error text.
